arts.ttl: Brentford 5-3 Wolves: Gary O'Neil left fuming with 'worst display as a coach'
arts.sum: Gary O'Neil describes Wolverhampton Wanderers' performance in the 5-3 defeat at Brentford as 'the worst' that he has overseen as a head coach.

arts.ttl: No kick-off, no problem as Brentford score early AGAIN
arts.sum: And they were unable to defend their early lead once more as this time Wolves equalised on 3min 57 seconds through Matheus Cunha, the first time that there has been two goals inside the opening four minutes of a Premier League match since Manchester United v Spurs four years ago. After scoring inside the opening minute of the past three matches Brentford were a bit slower on Saturday at home to Wolverhampton Wanderers, scoring after only 75 seconds, but in their defence they did not have the kick-off this time round.

arts.ttl: Gary O'Neil apologises as angry Wolves fans make feeling clear and Brentford take advantage
arts.sum: BRENTFORD 5-3 WOLVES: Gary O'Neil's side held out the Bees for 77 seconds, but the Midlands club find themselves rock bottom after conceding five to Thomas Frank's men

arts.ttl: Wolves remain without a win as Brentford strike early again
arts.sum: Nathan Collins scored in the second minute for the Bees while Wolves are still waiting for their first Premier League victory this season.

arts.ttl: Brentford boss Thomas Frank provides Christian Norgaard injury ahead ahead of Wolves clash
arts.sum: Brentford head coach Thomas Frank provides an injury update on Christian Norgaard ahead of Saturday's Premier League home meeting with Wolverhampton Wanderers.

arts.ttl: Gary ONeil Drops Major Wolves Injury Update for Brentford Clash
arts.sum: Gary O'Neil shared positive updates regarding his centre-backs ahead of Wolves' clash with Brentford.

arts.ttl: If you watch 60 seconds of the Premier League this weekend, make it Brentford
